title: Researchers develop automatic exposure system for volumetric 3D printing
summary_en: A team from the National Research Council Canada and the University of Victoria has developed a fully automatic exposure control system for tomographic volumetric additive manufacturing (VAM), a technique that fabricates entire objects at once using projected light patterns inside a rotating resin vat, significantly improving the process’s accuracy and repeatability. The results, shared in […]…
